name: Grounded: Making the Last of Us
description: Grounded: Making the Last of Us is a video starring Christophe Balestra, Jacob Minkoff, and Anthony Newman. Go behind-the-scenes to learn about the dogged development and unique philosophy at work in the making of the universally...

review.name: Behind The Masterpiece.
review.reviewBody:
Grounded is a Behind The Scenes documentary that gives us a glimpse of how complex and challenging creating something adventurous and new can be.

The Last Of Us was a bold project from the start and it really is amazing to see how it changed and took form, and became what I now believe to be one of the, if not, the best game of all time.

It took direction, it took dedication, and it took a huge amount of talent coming from all ends. If you compress all of that into one project, you get a masterpiece, and that's exactly what we got.
